alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 7:13PM CST until February 25 at 4:47AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Coldwater River near Sarah ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Coldwater River near Sarah. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Several homes in Marks are flooded. Farmland flooding is widepread. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 19.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 5.5 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
